Pages.Text: You can't select yourself during combat.  But if you still have trouble selecting a specific monster with the mouse, press the right mouse button and move the mouse to shift your view. Or, try using the keyboard keys [-] and [=] to cycle through nearby targets.  (You can use the keyboard to attack, too, with the keys [Delete] [End] [Page Down] as low, medium, and high.)  Now, go down these halls and get some practice! Tip: Press the [Home] key to select whoever last attacked you.
